mapper.update:
update biz_screensaver_material
screensaver_material_img_path = #{screensaverMaterialImgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
screensaver_material_size = #{screensaverMaterialSize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
screensaver_material_name = #{screensaverMaterialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
screensaver_material_img_name= #{screensaverMaterialImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
screensaver_material_type = #{screensaverMaterialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where screensaver_material_id = #{screensaverMaterialId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE biz_screensaver_material SET screensaver_material_img_path = #{screensaverMaterialImgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, screensaver_material_size = #{screensaverMaterialSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, screensaver_material_name = #{screensaverMaterialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, screensaver_material_img_name = #{screensaverMaterialImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, screensaver_material_type = #{screensaverMaterialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE screensaver_material_id = #{screensaverMaterialId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from biz_screensaver_material
and screensaver_material_name like concat('%',#{screensaverMaterialName},'%')
and screensaver_material_img_name like concat('%',#{screensaverMaterialImgName},'%')
and screensaver_material_type like concat('%',#{screensaverMaterialType},'%')
ORDER BY screensaver_material_id DESC

SELECT
FROM biz_screensaver_material bsm WHERE NOT exists ( SELECT screensaver_material_id FROM screensaver_material_relation smr WHERE smr.screensaver_material_id = bsm.screensaver_material_id ) ORDER BY screensaver_material_id DESC

select
from biz_screensaver_material JOIN screensaver_material_relation USING (screensaver_material_id) WHERE screensaver_id=#{screensaverId}
